thread.section_title: Bundle Stars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bundle Stars | www.bundlestars.com | 36 of 948
thread.title: Sonny

author: Sonny
title: Sonny
text: I really liked the variety of games within the bundles as well as, of course, the quantity of games. I have had a lot of these games in my Steam wishlist for a while, but have delayed purchasing them individually; whether it was waiting for a sale or whatever reason. Sure, not every game in each bundle is an award winner, but for the great price, you get some really great ones, as well as some you may never play.
